messages.usernameHint: Please enter a username to register to this application.
messages.usernameNotValid: Username is not valid, make sure you have at least 1 character and maximum 14.
messages.emailHint: Please enter the email you would like to register with to this application.
messages.emailNotValid: Email is not valid, make sure you have a '@' and a valid domain.
messages.ageNotValid: Age is not valid, must be between 0 and 120.
